name: Wisps Experiment
description:
Experiments will not wait 

You wake up in a huge place,  mostly monochrome. Below you see the endless void and nothing else. You have no choice, but to proceed forward. What a strange place indeed, not only platforms are levitating on their own, but also you see mysterious glowing objects following you, once being noticed by one of them.

Control: WASD - movement

Spacebar - Jump

P - Open pause menu and option menu

Wisps types: 

Defender(Blue) - have a cooldown ability to completely remove projectile attack and slightly defend you from knockback, once you get hit by one.

Booster(Green) - Gives you permanent speed boost, in cost of health

Jumper(Yellow) - Gives you permanent jump height increase, in cost of health

Platform Types: 

Blue colored - Pressing platform, when above them, force other platform to disappear over time

Red colored - Activate a temporary platforms, which will disappear after a while

Black pole - Checkpoint

Turrets types:

Basic (Black flagged) - have moderate attack and knockback

Knocker (Red flagged) - have low attack, but extreme knockback, can be used to traverse big gaps

Killer (Purple flagged) - have low knockback, but extreme attack. Can kill player by 2 hits
